item.title: OPHIDIA MEDIUM TOTE BAG
item.description: The Double G remains integral to the design, presented in GG Supreme canvas with a brown leather trim.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE LARGE TOTE BAG
item.description: The Round Interlocking G that characterises the Gucci Blondie line originates from the House archives.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE SMALL SHOULDER BAG
item.description: Signature pieces such as this Gucci Blondie shoulder and crossbody bag reinterpret the emblem as a subtler leather patch detail.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE TOP HANDLE BAG
item.description: The Round Interlocking G that characterises the Gucci Blondie line originates from the House archives.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE SMALL TOTE BAG
item.description: This Gucci Blondie tote bag pairs a top handle with a chain shoulder strap to infuse the accessory with a contemporary feel.

item.title: JUMBO GG BACKPACK
item.description: The all-black jumbo GG design returns for Pre-Fall 2023 atop a selection of leather luggage pieces.

item.title: GUCCI DECO MEDIUM TOTE BAG
item.description: Revering tradition with a retro feel, the House logo explores new expressions with the Interlocking G hardware on the flap closure.

item.title: GUCCI DECO MINI SHOULDER BAG
item.description: Classic silhouettes and refined materials explore new expressions and a deep-rooted fascination for the past.

item.title: 1953 HORSEBIT LOAFER IN LEATHER
item.description: Our 1953 Horsebit loafer in leather. Since the introduction of its classic shape in the 1950s.

item.title: MEN'S INTERLOCKING G SANDAL
item.description: The monogram reimagined. This pair of slide sandals is presented in brown leather with a cut-out Interlocking G.

item.title: MEN'S GG SNEAKER
item.description: A striking silhouette that takes inspiration from the tennis courts.

item.title: MEN'S ACE EMBROIDERED SNEAKER
item.description: The Ace low-top sneaker in leather is embellished with the gold embroidered bee against the Web stripe.

item.title: MEN'S GG SNEAKER
item.description: Crafted from perforate GG leather, the monogram motif adds a logo twist.

item.title: MEN'S GG EMBOSSED SNEAKER
item.description: Crafted from white GG embossed leather, the monogram motif adds a logo twist.

item.title: WOMEN'S DOUBLE G BALLET FLAT
item.description: Subtle House details add a logo touch to this pair of ballet flats.

item.title: WOMEN'S PETITE GG SLINGBACK PUMP
item.description: Crafted from yellow leather, a T-strap detail on the front enhances the elegance of the style's classic silhouette.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE WIDE BELT
item.description: The Gucci Love Parade unfolded along the iconic Hollywood Boulevard.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE WIDE BELT
item.description: The emblematic Double G is reintroduced for Spring Summer 2020 in a luminous gold-tone, set on a men's smooth black leather belt.

item.title: GG MARMONT MATELASSÉ WIDE
item.description: For Pre-Fall 2023, heritage codes continue to be reimagined.

item.title: GUCCI BLONDIE BELT
item.description: Playing with this theme, the accessories and pieces of ready-to-wear continue to reimagine and reintroduce heritage details.

item.title: GG MARMONT REVERSIBLE BELT
item.description: This beige and ebony belt in GG Supreme canvas reverses to brown leather.

item.title: GG MARMONT MATELASSÉ WIDE BELT
item.description: Crafed from pink Matelassé leather, this wide belt is defined by a gold-toned hardware.

item.title: LEATHER BELT WITH DOUBLE G BUCKLE
item.description: An unfinished faded leather belt in brown with a Double G buckle.

item.title: THIN BELT WITH CRYSTAL GUCCI BUCKLE
item.description: Classic designs are reinvented through the Gucci lens with standout details.

item.title: GUCCI LINK TO LOVE BAGUETTE DIAMOND RING
item.description: The Gucci Link to Love collection is an exploration of modern romance characterizing new symbols of love.

item.title: GUCCI LINK TO LOVE STRIPED RING
item.description: This 18k white gold studded ring has a stackable mechanism.

item.title: GUCCI LINK TO LOVE BAGUETTE DIAMOND RING
item.description: The Gucci Link to Love collection is an exploration of modern romance characterizing new symbols of love.

item.title: ICON 18K STAR RING
item.description: This precious ring is presented in 18k yellow gold with a delicate band featuring the GG motif.

item.title: FLORA 18K DIAMOND RING
item.description: The Gucci Flora line plays with the origins of its name to present a selection of pieces with botanical inspirations.

item.title: GUCCI LINK TO LOVE ENAMEL AND DIAMOND RING
item.description: This 18k yellow gold, black enamel ring has a stackable mechanism and central white diamond.

item.title: ICON 18K STAR RING
item.description: The piece's focal point are the cut-out stars, that recall the Gucci Cosmogonie fashion show.

item.title: GUCCI LINK TO LOVE MIRRORED RING
item.description: The collection combines different gold tones and a mix of finishes blending the lines between masculine and feminine.
